channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Neverland Ranch Threatened by ‘Lake Fire’ in California
item.description: The fire erupted on Friday near Zaca Lake, northeast of Los Olivos, Calif. As of Sunday, it had burned more than 16,000 acres and was zero percent contained.

item.title: French Election Yields Deadlock as Left Surges and Far Right Comes Up Short
item.description: The outcome left no party with an absolute majority and France bracing for potential political paralysis.

item.title: France’s post-election political chaos sets the stage for a weak government and a lower global profile
item.description: “The absence of majority and the absence of government will expose France and French people to formidable danger.”

item.title: French Election Yields Deadlock as Left Surges and Far Right Comes Up Short
item.description: The outcome left no party with an absolute majority and France bracing for potential political paralysis.

item.title: New Plan to Target Russia’s Oil Revenue Brings Debate in White House
item.description: Treasury officials want to impose penalties on tankers that help Russian oil evade sanctions. White House aides worry that risks making gasoline more expensive.

item.title: Paramount Global special committee backs merger with David Ellison’s Skydance Media
item.description: The full board is set to approve the deal with the parties signing final paperwork Sunday and an announcement coming as soon as Monday.

item.title: Skydance Reaches Deal to Merge With Paramount
item.description: The deal, approved by Paramount’s board, ushers in a new chapter for the company, which owns CBS and the movie studio behind “Top Gun.”

item.title: How the French Election Results Unfolded
item.description: A left-wing coalition unexpectedly surged and the far-right National Rally fell short of predictions. But no coalition captured a majority in Parliament, meaning months of gridlock could lie ahead.

item.title: Hedge funds have no idea what to do about Tesla as shares rally while Trump, tariffs, and backlash against ‘woke’ EVs loom
item.description: It’s not clear if Tesla is “a top company with a great management team” or “a challenged franchise with deficient corporate governance.”

item.title: Joe Biden, in the Goodest Bunker Ever
item.description: The White House desperately tries to take word salad off the menu.

item.title: France’s Campaign Season Was Marred by Racist Attacks and Violent Acts
item.description: Gérald Darmanin, France’s interior minister, said that more than 50 people — including candidates, their substitutes or supporters — had been “physically assaulted” during the campaign.

item.title: Texas braces for Beryl as storm threatens to regain hurricane strength before making landfall
item.description: A hurricane warning extended from Baffin Bay, south of Corpus Christi, to Sargent, south of Houston.

item.title: Young Couples Move in Together Early to Save on Rent
item.description: Citing high housing costs, some couples are sharing apartments after dating for just a short period. Not all relationships survive.

item.title: How the Far-Right National Rally Did in France’s Elections
item.description: The party fell short of expectations but had captured its highest number of National Assembly seats.

item.title: Euro falls as France’s left wing looks to score stunning election victory, raising fears of more spending and deeper deficits
item.description: The common currency slipped 0.3% to around $1.0807 at the start of the session in Asia.
